data.name: Karakuri-kun: A Japanese Tale
data.detailed_description:
üìóStory

Join Karakuri-kun on her adventure to learn Japanese culture and history.

You play as an automaton robot built by a toy maker and brought to life by a Shinto priest.

üìúJapanese History

In an RPG setting you will learn an overview of Japanese history and learn some important players of Japan's past, such as:

  • Miyamoto Musashi
  • Oda Nobunaga
  • The Edo Period of Japan

‚öôÔ∏èFeatures

  • Battle and quiz your way to victory!
  • Choose from 3 outfits to change your elemental powers

‚ú¥Ô∏èFranchise Game

This game is a spin-off from the Japanese language game Japanese Romaji Adventure.

You can learn Japanese with these following games:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1388720/

*NOTE

Game was made in Japan

data.short_description: A toy maker has made his masterpiece, a Japanese robot that has come to life. Play as Karakuri-kun and learn Japanese history of the samurai and the Edo period through this JRPG.
data.reviews:
‚ÄúAs the game progresses, you will immerse yourself in Japanese culture and history‚Äù

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
